member.name: T:DAX.IO.GIS.ESRICoordinate
member.summary: Used to hold coordinates (x,y,z and m) returned from SDE binary conversion.

member.name: M:DAX.IO.GIS.SDEBinary.SDEBinary2Coords(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Double,System.Double,System.Double,System.Double)

summary.para: Converts SDE Compressed binary to a list of coordinates.
You'll need to fetch falseX, falseY, falseZ and xyUnits values from SDE_spatial_references to do the conversion.
Also you need to know the number of coordinates in the binary, which can be found in the f(feature) table along with the binary data.
To find the srid use the SDE_layers table.
To find the f table use the SDE_geometry_columns table.

member.param: Byte array containing SDE compressed binary data
Value to be found in the SDE_geometry_columns table
Value to be found in the SDE_geometry_columns table
Value to be found in the SDE_geometry_columns table
Value to be found in the SDE_geometry_columns table
Value to be found in the SDE_geometry_columns table
